print("(".join(v1[: len(v1) // 2 + int(v2)]) + ")".join(v1[len(v1) // 2:]))

v1 = input()

v2 = len(v1) % 2 == 1
v3 = "(".join(v1[: len(v1) // 2 + int(v2)])[:-1 if v2 else None]
